title: Washed Up...
content:
Hi   
   
Is there a font that contains international washing symbols for clothing? I know its a bizarre request, but can anyone help?   
   
Thanks
author: rich

comments.content:
Or this, not a font, but eps, and a big assortment:   
 [http://www.textileaffairs.com/hirez.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013044909/http:/www.textileaffairs.com/hirez.htm)   
   
David Roughs
